# Allow all crawlers including AI bots
User-agent: *
Disallow:

# Allow major AI crawlers for content indexing
User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Disallow:
User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow:
User-agent: Google-Extended
Disallow:
User-agent: anthropic-ai
Disallow:
User-agent: Claude-Web
Disallow:
User-agent: CCBot
Disallow:
User-agent: PerplexityBot
Disallow:

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://toolsapplab.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay (optional, respectful to servers)
Crawl-delay: 1
